thread.title: Excellent hotel in a Moroccan style - Review
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel in a Moroccan style - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: owagner
title: Excellent hotel in a Moroccan style - Review
text:
I stayed for the third time with my wife at this hotel. For me it is the best hotel in New York. Incredibly nice rooms, friendly service and a sensational ambience.
The entire hotel is in the moroccan style, absolutely gorgeous. For couples in love just the right thing ..
Room Tip: Higher floors better, view to the Square Garden See more room tips
